storyInfo: In response to an abnormality exhibited during a mission, a Cardinal of the Fifth Tribunal holds a conversation with Executor.

attributes.content: Name, Federico Giallo.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Correct. All physiological indicators are currently normal, with no sensation of discomfort.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Ready to accept inquiries.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: This is just a chat, and not an inquiry? Understood. I will answer all questions truthfully to the best of my knowledge.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Proceed.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: This wasn't my first encounter with this deadpan, stone-cold new hire.
Last year, the Notarial Hall recruited three new trainee executors, but unfortunately, two of them were ultimately unable to join our ranks.

One failed the traineeship period's assessment exam, while the other suddenly discovered that inheriting the family dessert shop would be a more fitting career path and handed in his resignation the day before he was to start as a regular.
The last one remaining was this young man by the name of Federico.

attributes.options: Federico, I'd like to hear your account of how the mission went again.

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: This mission was dispatched by the Notarial Hall, the party a deceased Lateran citizen.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The party stated in his will that he hoped to find his lost heir and bring the heir back to Laterano.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Due to the difficulty of executing this will, the commission was carried out by two executors. I have brought back the testamentary heir, whose identity has already been confirmed.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.options: According to the report, your partner died during the mission.;According to the report, you were seriously injured during the operation.

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The executor, Bertoni, was killed in action.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The records are correct.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Three impact wounds and one puncture injury; none of them life-threatening, and already treated.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: During the execution of this mission, Executor Bertoni and I entered the Bolívarian border region to locate the heir, as per the decedent's will.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The area is currently war-stricken and devoid of stable social order.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The testamentary heir was involved in a local armed conflict, which hindered the completion of our mission.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: During our search, we were involved in three skirmishes, during which the testamentary heir was held hostage for a period of time, and Executor Bertoni was seriously wounded.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: His injuries were severe, and it was difficult to render life-saving treatment given the circumstances and requirements.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: He made his own assessment and decided on the next course of action.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: He proposed that he would serve as a diversion to draw away attention, while I would act under cover to ensure the safety of the testamentary heir.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Given the situation, I determined this to be a reasonable course of action.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Up until this point, his account of the mission contained not even a single half-truth.
Our executors are dispatched to some of the most dangerous places in their line of duty. It is not uncommon for them to expire in the course of their duties.
But, Federico's situation is somewhat special.
The colleague in charge of handling this case had a number of concerns, which is why I am now standing here questioning this young man.

attributes.options: However, you didn't act according to his plan.

attributes.content: If I may be blunt, Executor Bertoni's plan conflicted with the will we were to execute.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The will, in addition to explicitly requesting the Notarial Hall to locate the missing heir and escort the heir back to Laterano, had a further implicit request.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: 'I hope that all Laterans may return to their homeland.'
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: This was the final request attached to his will.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Now that his will has been processed by the Notarial Hall, it is my duty to see it executed to the fullest extent.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: 'I hope that all Laterans may return to their homeland.'
A wonderful wish. But, I must say, is it truly a component of the will that requires execution?
I look into the pair of eyes before me.
They are resolute, calm, and do not betray even the slightest ripple.
How I wish I could see something beyond that expanse of pale blue.
In Executor Bertoni's plan, his course of action regarding himself was unclear.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The situation along the Bolívarian border is chaotic, and the lines of allegiance there are murky. There are many forces among them that are hostile to Laterano.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Under such circumstances, I could not abide by the plan and leave on my own with the testamentary heir.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I request your understanding.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.options: You knew exactly what state Bertoni was in when you carried him back to Laterano, yes?

attributes.content: Yes, without a doubt.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Executor Bertoni was largely incapacitated by the time we tried to escape, so I was responsible for carrying out the subsequent arrangements.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The weight of a grown man was within tolerable load capacity, and did not constitute a major problem.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: At the time, his blood loss had already exceeded the tolerance limit of the human body, his temperature had dropped to a dangerous level, and he had quickly lost consciousness.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: On the day we broke away from the Bolívarian border, Executor Bertoni was confirmed deceased.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Not the first time I've heard of a colleague's passing, and it won't be the last time either.
What I find inconceivable is, what would Bertoni think now, were the dead capable of knowing what happened?
Would he want to see someone so young injured to the point of near death, just to bring him back to Laterano?

attributes.options: He certainly would not approve of what you did.

attributes.content: Executor Bertoni did, in fact, object.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But he could not provide a reasonable explanation for his objection, so I chose to maintain my decision.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: When considering my duties in tandem with the situation at hand, the execution of the decedent's will took priority over Executor Bertoni's personal wishes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: If there are special circumstances, I will take them into consideration.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: This is what I came to understand; another thing that made Federico Giallo unique––
This young man is somewhat lacking in empathy.
The decision we reached before was that this deficiency would not affect his work as an executor.
But now, I might need to re-evaluate that decision.

attributes.options: Federico, do you think that Bertoni's wishes were unimportant?;Why don't you try putting yourself in his shoes and consider how he was feeling at the time?

attributes.content: I respect Executor Bertoni's wishes.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But, I cannot say I see the point of such an action.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Executor Bertoni was one of the participating functionaries of this mission. As executors, it is our common wish to ensure the smooth execution of the decedent's will.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I do not believe there has ever been any disagreement regarding this point.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I begin to want to let out a sigh.
Bertoni ultimately decided to use himself as bait, so what do you think he was trying to accomplish?
Instead, the young man in front of me rushed into the brawl, almost paying the ultimate price, coming back with scars all over his body just to retrieve Bertoni...
Does he really not care?
Does he truly not understand... what Bertoni wanted?

attributes.options: Federico, can you understand how I feel right now?;Federico, do you really know nothing about emotion?

attributes.content: The young man in front of me does not speak.
He looks at me, as if trying to determine something. But what is there to determine?
Suddenly, he moves.
He picks up a pen, and draws something on the piece of white paper lying on the table.
It is a circle.
What you feel is grief.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The young man in front of me does not speak.
He looks at me, as if deep in thought about something.
Suddenly, he moves.
He picks up a pen, and draws something on the piece of white paper lying on the table.
It is a square.
There is doubt within our conversation.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: During your line of questioning just now, you were trying to test me. You exhibited doubt, sadness, and many other emotions.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: The young executor draws more lines on the sheet of paper.
I don't understand the cause of emotion, and it's difficult to grasp what emotions mean to individuals, but I do understand their consequences.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Different emotions can be substituted with lines; straight lines and curves form different patterns, which is very helpful to me.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Due to a birth defect, I am unable to empathize with others like most of my kind.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But, this does not affect my work within the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I will carry out the missions assigned to me. If necessary, I will attempt to understand the emotions of the decedent or other contractual party.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: As Federico says this, he suddenly pauses for a moment.
My mood has already changed as a result of his answer, but what he says next astounds me even more.
After finishing Executor Bertoni's post-mortem processing, I submitted an application for the execution of his will to the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Before carrying out his final act, Bertoni said to me:
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: 'If I make it back alive, I swear I'll attempt the ten-scoop challenge at the gelato shop in front of the basilica.'
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: 'If luck isn't on my side, then I'll need you to eat a hundred scoops for me!'
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: –The above is the oral will of Executor Bertoni.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: That was likely nothing more than Bertoni's form of self-deprecation, or some joke.
Finally, I couldn't hold myself back from cutting in.
The lines he drew formed various geometric figures, arranged into an orderly array upon the sheet of paper. But my eyes see no rhyme or reason to them.
I can't help but to wonder, did Bertoni have his own diagram of this sort when he uttered those words?
Your Cardinal, I have the ability to determine whether information is truthful or not.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Though I am unable to empathize with him, I have had similar experiences, and able to determine whether he truly meant those words.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Because, it is extremely rare to have misunderstandings arise from the receipt of false signals.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Federico maintains his composure from beginning to end. Anyone would think that him a cold and heartless man.
Just a few minutes ago, I was trying to determine whether his lack of empathy would affect his work for the Notarial Hall.
But now, I once again find myself beginning to sigh at this young man's performance.
I ask myself: Yes, Federico Giallo has his flaws, but so what?
Could it be said that because of his flaws, he is an emotionless, mechanical, and unfeeling individual?

attributes.options: Is this method of reading emotions through lines something you were born with as well?

attributes.content: No, this is a method that my parents taught me.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: For the first time, the young man hesitates at my questioning.
I see his hands move again while he speaks, drawing more shapes upon the white paper.
But this time there is no need for me to ask what they mean, nor should I.
They were formerly members of the Pontifica Cohors and later transferred to the Notarial Hall as Executors, who died in the line of duty.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Part of their will was for me to be able to understand emotions, and the time I witnessed their deaths was the first attempt I made at interpreting this.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Sadness, wistfulness.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: There are some similarities with Executor Bertoni's case.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Hmm?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Your mood has changed again. Why?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I have no way of answering the question.
After so many years in this line of work, I certainly do not wear my heart on my sleeves anymore.
But, this young man speaks so firmly, without a shred of doubt.
As executors of the Notarial Hall, we are more likely than any other Laterans to witness human life in all its myriad forms. From the living to the dead, we must confront all of it.
In this sense, it is perhaps only Federico among us who truly has no distractions.
Perhaps... he has what it takes to become an exemplar of an executor.

attributes.options: Thank you for answering all my questions.
Federico, what do you plan to do next?

attributes.content: Though it lacked a formal application process and was only dictated by the parties involved, Bertoni's will was witnessed by another executor.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Under these circumstances, I believe that his dictation can be regarded as a formal will.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: As such, I will submit my application to carry out this will.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: After saying that, the young executor's expression changes slightly for the first time.
It is a subtle frown.
...I have applied for the funding needed to purchase a hundred scoops of gelato.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I will carry out what the living and deceased have entrusted to me...
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: ...no matter what.
attributes.name: Federico
